# GooseStack

> One-command macOS AI agent installer. Run `curl -fsSL https://goosestack.dev/install.sh | sh` to set up a complete AI development environment: Homebrew, Node.js, OpenClaw, Ollama, and an optimal local LLM — all auto-configured for your hardware.

## What It Does
- Detects your Mac's chip (M1–M4, Intel) and RAM
- Installs Homebrew, Node.js, OpenClaw AI agent, Ollama
- Downloads the optimal local model for your hardware
- Configures local embeddings, memory search, token optimization
- Sets up security suite (file integrity, automated audits)
- Installs always-on watchdog with auto-restart

## Two Ways to Use
- **BYOK (Bring Your Own Key)**: Free forever. Use your own Anthropic/OpenAI API key.
- **GooseStack API**: Prepaid credits, no API key needed. 40% markup on token costs. Zero friction.

## Pricing
- **Free**: Full installer, local models, dashboard, security suite, BYOK support
- **Pro**: Prepaid credits for GooseStack Proxy API, Token Router, premium skills, priority support

## Requirements
- macOS 13+ (Ventura or newer)
- 8GB+ RAM (16GB+ recommended)
- Apple Silicon recommended (Intel supported)
- 15GB free disk space

## Links
- Website: https://goosestack.dev
- GitHub: https://github.com/TheBigAndFamousGoose/goosestack
- Install: `curl -fsSL https://goosestack.dev/install.sh | sh`
